HomePage.about_p1: With over two decades of excellence in healthcare recruitment and workforce solutions, LinkedMed was founded in 2022, establishing its inaugural office in Dubaiâ€”an epicenter of medical innovation and global connectivity. Expanding our footprint, we launched in Frankfurt, a cornerstone of European healthcare, and are now poised to extend our expertise to Cairo, further solidifying our presence in key medical hubs.
HomePage.about_p2: As a premier healthcare talent acquisition firm, LinkedMed specializes in sourcing, credentialing, and placing elite medical professionals across 10+ countries. We collaborate with world-class healthcare institutions, ensuring seamless integration of top-tier doctors, physicians, surgeons, nurses, pharmacists, and allied healthcare specialists into high-caliber medical environments.
HomePage.about_p3: Our mission is to elevate healthcare standards by aligning exceptional clinical talent with prestigious medical institutions worldwide. Through strategic workforce solutions, we bridge the gap between expertise and opportunity, optimizing patient care outcomes and advancing the future of global medicine.

footer.missionStatement: Our mission is to provide exceptional services.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.attention: ATTENTION: PLEASE READ THESE TERMS CAREFULLY BEFORE USING THIS WEBSITE. BY ACCESSING AND USING THIS WEBSITE, YOU AGREE TO BE BOUND BY THESE TERMS AND CONDITIONS. IF YOU DO NOT ACCEPT THESE TERMS, PLEASE DO NOT USE THIS WEBSITE.

definitions.we: "we" refers to LinkedMed, a medical recruitment company operating in Germany, Dubai, and Egypt.
definitions.you: "you" refers to the individual, firm, company, or organization accessing or using the LinkedMed website and services.

serviceAvailability.title: Service Availability
serviceAvailability.description: While we strive to maintain the highest standards and continuous availability of our website and services, the internet is subject to occasional interruptions and downtime. We do not accept liability for any service interruptions, errors, delays, or loss of access to our website and services.

informationAccuracy.title: Information Accuracy
informationAccuracy.description: We endeavor to provide accurate and up-to-date information; however, some details may be provided by third parties, and we cannot guarantee complete accuracy. We do not accept liability for any inaccuracies or omissions.

thirdPartyLinks.title: Third-Party Links
thirdPartyLinks.description: Our website may contain links to third-party websites. We do not have control over these websites and do not accept responsibility for their content, security, or data protection policies.

linking.title: Linking to LinkedMed's Website
conditions: You do not misrepresent your relationship with LinkedMed.
You do not present false information about our services.
You do not use LinkedMed's logo without prior consent.
Your website does not contain offensive or unlawful content.
You obtain permission before linking beyond our homepage.

acceptableUse.title: Acceptable Use of the Website
acceptableUse.purpose: You may only use our website for lawful purposes related to job seeking or staff recruitment.
prohibitions: Attempt to gain unauthorized access to the website.
Disrupt, damage, or impair website functionality.
Post or submit false, misleading, or unlawful information.
Upload viruses, malware, or harmful software.

candidateResponsibilities.title: Candidate Responsibilities
candidateResponsibilities.description: Candidates using our services must ensure that all information provided is accurate, complete, and truthful. LinkedMed does not accept responsibility for incorrect, misleading, or fraudulent information provided by candidates. If a candidate provides false information, they bear full legal responsibility for any resulting consequences, including loss of employment opportunities or legal action.

dataProtection.title: Data Protection and Privacy
dataProtection.description: LinkedMed is committed to protecting your personal data in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) in Germany, the Federal Data Protection Act (BDSG), UAE data protection laws, and Egyptian data regulations. We process your data for recruitment purposes and comply with legal requirements. For more information, please refer to our Privacy Policy.

userSubmissions.title: Information Submitted by Users
conditions: Consent to us processing and sharing your information for recruitment purposes.
Confirm that all provided information is accurate and lawful.
Understand that third-party recruitment agencies working with LinkedMed must adhere to our terms and conditions.

termsOfBusiness.title: Terms of Business
termsOfBusiness.description: Each employment assignment or placement facilitated by LinkedMed is subject to our standard Terms of Business, which will be provided to employers and candidates upon engagement.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property Rights
intellectualProperty.description: All content on this website, including text, graphics, logos, and software, is owned by or licensed to LinkedMed. You may not copy, distribute, or reproduce any material from this website without prior written permission.

securityAndAccount.title: Security and Account Management
securityAndAccount.description: Users are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their login credentials. If you suspect unauthorized access to your account, you must notify us immediately. We are not liable for any unauthorized use of your account.

terminationOfAccess.title: Termination of Access
terminationOfAccess.description: We reserve the right to terminate or restrict access to our website and services at any time, at our sole discretion, without prior notice.

limitationOfLiability.description: We reserve the right to terminate or restrict access to our website and services at any time, at our sole discretion, without prior notice.
limitationOfLiability.title: Limitation of Liability
exemptions: Any loss of business, revenue, or profits resulting from website use.
Any errors, delays, or interruptions in service.
Any claims arising from the misuse of candidate or employer-provided information.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law and Jurisdiction
governingLaw.description: The use of our website and any agreements made through it shall be governed by the respective legal frameworks of Germany, the United Arab Emirates (Dubai), depending on the jurisdiction of service.

updates.title: Updates to Terms & Conditions
updates.description: We may update these terms periodically. Continued use of our website signifies acceptance of any updated terms.
